_learningOutcomes.outcome: Describe the open data publication phases
Identify a number of key processes to improve the sustainable publication of open data
Apply a number of open data guidelines to ensure open data becomes sustainable
Identify different characteristics in data and associated data formats
Justify approaches for publishing different types of data in different ways
Describe the data spectrum and how it applies to different types of data
Describe the importance of persistent identifiers for data
Apply the five stars of linked open data to analyse technical quality of data
Explain the difference between the data on the web and the web of data
List a number of patterns for discovering open data on and in the Web
Create search patterns that enable discovery of open data
Analyse the challenges in using existing open data
Analyse the benefits and drawbacks of publishing data on different open data platforms
Describe the approaches for publishing data
Differentiate between data catalogues, data portals and data management systems
Publish a number of datasets on different open data platforms
Create a process model for publishing different datasets
